Despite reckless behavior, attempts to get Mom, who is in great pain and pregnant, to the hospital urgently.
Makes a sweeping left turn from the middle lane despite the old blind woman crossing, forcing the car onto the sidewalk and through tables.
Weaves in and out of traffic, making left and right turns skillfully while being chased by a motorcycle cop.
Hits the back bumper of an antique convertible due to not looking ahead carefully.
Rockets through a yellow light and coasts through a large puddle in reverse, managing to keep control of the vehicle under difficult conditions.
Swoops the car safely around dangerous steel girders to protect his family and stops to ensure their safety.
Stays behind at the car, apparently ashamed of the damaged Cadillac, while family helps injured Mom.
Swoops the car safely around the hanging steel girders and screeches to a stop in a tow zone, avoiding a serious accident.
Remains standing by the destroyed Cadillac, ashamed, rather than helping after the crash.
